nodes.text: The Coruscant subway was a system of underground railways on Coruscant.

During the Battle of Coruscant in 19 BBY, General Grievous and some IG-100 MagnaGuards chased Shaak Ti, Roron Corobb, Foul Moudama and Palpatine through the subways in an attempt to kidnap the Supreme Chancellor. The ensuing pursuit damaged the subway's automated turnstile, a window, and possibly a train when a MagnaGuard droid was thrown in front of it.
At this time, entrance to the subway cost each passenger two Republic credits.
